title: Microsoft Teams
headline: The free online course on the Microsoft Teams application for professionals, as well as how to create and manage teams.
description: This free online Microsoft Team course will introduce you to the application, Microsoft Teams, as well as its usefulness to professionals and how the application can be accessed or downloaded. You will also be introduced to the step by step process for creating teams, as well as how both internal and external members can be added to a team. You will also learn about making announcements, as well as adding messaging extensions to Microsoft Teams.
courseDescription:
This free online course will introduce you to the application, Microsoft Teams, as well as its usefulness to professionals and how the application can be accessed or downloaded. The course will then teach you about the general outlook of the Microsoft Teams application dashboard. The step by step process for a user to get help when working with the Microsoft Teams application will also be covered in this course.

Then, this course will teach you about the step by step process for creating teams, as well as how both internal and external members can be added to a team. The process for creating and managing channels, as well as posting messages on these channels will also be covered in this course. Furthermore, this course will teach you how to use specific functions like the @mentions and tags on the Microsoft Teams application.

Lastly, this course will teach you how to bookmark important messages on Microsoft Teams for future reference, as well as making announcements and adding messaging extensions on Microsoft Teams. This course is helpful for learners who want to gain an understanding of how Microsoft Teams works and its importance to professionals in boosting productivity. Begin this course now to become proficient in the use of the Microsoft Teams application.
